comments.author: passfree@gmail.com
comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_6_8) AppleWebKit/535.8 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/17.0.942.0 Safari/535.8

Steps to reproduce:

Without accessibility.typeaheadfind.flashBar in greprefs.js xulrunner applications which make use of the findbar will fail with an error. This is the only preference missing to make the findbar work by default.

User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_6_8) AppleWebKit/535.8 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/17.0.942.0 Safari/535.8

Steps to reproduce:

Without accessibility.typeaheadfind.flashBar in greprefs.js xulrunner applications which make use of the findbar will fail with an error. This is the only preference missing to make the findbar work by default.
